EnumDef.summary: Specifies the edge for nested docking.

Member.name: Left
Member.summary: The 's left edge is docked to its containing 's left edge.

Member.name: Right
Member.summary: The 's right edge is docked to its containing 's right edge.

Member.name: Top
Member.summary: The 's top edge is docked to its containing 's top edge.

Member.name: Bottom
Member.summary: The 's bottom edge is docked to its containing 's bottom edge.

EnumDef.summary: Specifies all the available docking areas.

Member.name: Float
Member.summary: The floating window docking area.

Member.name: DockTop
Member.summary: The top docking area of the

Member.name: DockLeft
Member.summary: The left docking area of the .

Member.name: DockRight
Member.summary: The right docking area of the .

Member.name: DockBottom
Member.summary: The bottom docking area of the .

Member.name: Document
Member.summary: The document area of the .

EnumDef.summary: Specifies the docking state for docking windows.

Member.name: Unknown
Member.summary: Unknown docking state.

Member.name: Float
Member.summary: Displayed inside float window.

Member.name: DockTopAutoHide
Member.summary: Displayed as auto-hide window, on the top edge.

Member.name: DockLeftAutoHide
Member.summary: Displayed as auto-hide window, on the left edge.

Member.name: DockBottomAutoHide
Member.summary: Displayed as auto-hide window, on the bottom edge.

Member.name: DockRightAutoHide
Member.summary: Displayed as auto-hide window, on the right edge.

Member.name: Document
Member.summary: Displayed as document window.

Member.name: DockTop
Member.summary: Docked to the top edge.

Member.name: DockLeft
Member.summary: Docked to the left edge.

Member.name: DockRight
Member.summary: Docked to the right edge.

Member.name: DockBottom
Member.summary: Docked to the bottom edge.

Member.name: Hidden
Member.summary: The window is hidden.

EnumDef.summary: Specifies the style for document windows.

Member.name: DockingMdi
Member.summary: Docked in a tabbed manner, MDI integration with the main form.

Member.name: DockingWindow
Member.summary: Docked in a tabbed manner, no MDI integration with the main form.

Member.name: DockingSdi
Member.summary: Docked in a tabbed manner, no MDI integration with the main form. Hide the tab when there is only one document in the .

Member.name: SystemMdi
Member.summary: System style MDI form.
